attributes.action: support South Central Strategic Health Authority's decision to add fluoride to Southampton's water supply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The benefits of adding fluoride to water supplies are manifold and there are clear precedents for the successful implementation of such schemes, with excellent results in dental health.  Meanwhile there are many people spouting scare stories and pseudoscience that adding fluoride would somehow be a risk to health; such risks are unproven at best and in many cases without any foundation at all.
